questions.question: Why are all these idioms sending around your penis?
questions.context: **In the public place**. I don't understand. I don't understand. Floppy nine. Why are all these idioms sending around your penis? Where are you hearing this? My dad always said, don't be around the bush. I've heard my dad say that too. Right. Don't beat my dick off with your left hand. You should write him. That's just strong hand. Pick on my balls with your left hand. You've heard someone say this. Yeah. People say it. I've never heard any of these things you're saying. I mean, I didn't. I mean, you think I just made this shit up? It's Eric. Yo, what's good? Yo, did you get those tickets yet? Oh, shit, I forgot. I was going to buy them tonight. You've got to be yanking my dick off, man. It told me like eight times you're going to be the same.
